AboutUs.name: About Us
paras: Nothing succeeds like success and the key ingredients to the recipe of success are hard work, sincerity and perseverance . These are the very values, Nilesh Jaiswal has sworn by since the last many years of his professional life as a teacher.

From a very humble beginning in the year 1995 when the student strength was as meagre as two in number to a substantial increase of 2000 students benefiting from the mentoring by Nilesh. And all this has been achieved without a single press ad and just by a word of mouth publicity.
Students mentored by Nilesh have carved a niche for themselves in the area of engineering, medicine, IT etc .
We aspire to stand by the mentioned core values throught out our professional career.
AboutUs.WhyUsPara: At Concept to Education, we offer an exceptional mathematics and science education. With expert educators, personalized learning, and a passion for excellence, we're committed to shaping academic success. Join us to unlock your potential and embark on a journey of growth and discovery in mathematics and science.
facilities: Classes designed to be engaging and interactive

Offers.name: What We Offer
Offers.para: At Concept to Education, we're committed to your academic and personal growth. Our promise is quality education, support, and a pathway to success. Join us on this fulfilling journey.
courses: At 'Concept to Education,' we specialize in expert math coaching, serving students from 7th to 12th grade.
At 'Concept to Education,' we specialize in expert science coaching, serving students from 7th to 10th grade.
This coaching provides an exclusive app for students, enabling progress tracking, tests, and access to learning modules.

Statistics.name: Achievements Backed by Impressive Statistics
paras: Teaching since 1995, now with 28+ Years of experience
Shaped the career of 7000+ students till now
More than 90% students gets above average marks every year

Questions.name: Frequently Asked Questions
quests: What subjects and courses are offered?
We offer a wide range of courses in mathematics (from classes 7th - 12th) and science (from classes 7th - 10th)
We maintain small class sizes to ensure personalized attention for every student.
Is there any online support available for students?
Yes, we provide online support through our learning management system, allowing students to access resources anytime anywhere.
